Package rmi

Class Summary
ChatClient This class resembles a client in a chat service box.
Network Class that resembles the network that the client and server are associated with.
Network.ChatMessage The class tha manages chat messages being sent across from client to server to other clients.
Network.RegisterName The class manages when clients are just signing onto the server.
Network.RosterUpdate The class tha manages when a user signs in to update the roster.
Network.UpdateNames The class that manages when clients are sign off and must update the name list column.
Server This class resembles a chat server that accepts any number of clients.
Server.ChatConnection This holds all the connection information and the name of the client
